changes.reasoning: Add Supabase authentication infrastructure. Creates browser and server clients for Supabase, an AuthContext provider that manages user sessions and GitHub OAuth tokens, and an auth callback route to handle the OAuth redirect flow.
Add authentication UI components. SignInButton triggers GitHub OAuth login, UserMenu displays the signed-in user's avatar with a dropdown for signing out.
Create URL-based routing structure with dynamic segments. Each route page extracts params from the URL and renders the appropriate component, enabling deep linking and browser navigation.
Simplify home page to be a landing page. Shows sign-in button for unauthenticated users, or repo selector for authenticated users. Navigation now uses URL routing instead of React state.
